user.title: Connect to SecuraCV
user.description:
Enter the connection details for your SecuraCV Privacy Witness Kernel instance.

The kernel runs as a Home Assistant add-on, Docker container, or standalone service.

data_description.url: URL of the Privacy Witness Kernel Event API (e.g., http://privacy_witness_kernel:8799)
data_description.token: Bearer token from the kernel's api_token file
data_description.enable_mqtt: Subscribe to MQTT topics for real-time Canary device updates
data_description.mqtt_prefix: MQTT topic prefix for Canary devices (default: securacv)

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the Privacy Witness Kernel. Check the URL and ensure the kernel is running.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API token. Read the token from the kernel's api_token file.
